tweet: following our new site launch www.tonystextiles.co.uk, we are giving twitter a go. Keep your eyes peeled for updates.
after 34 years at beverley market we've decided to move on and go online!
thanks to all our loyal customers, friends and family for your gifts and kind words, sad to leave beverley market
our website has taken off, watch out for special offers to all our followers
